title: Brushpot
marks:
Signature, inscription and sticker

on side, inc on side, incised: Zhi Ting seal
description: cylindrical, slightly waisted shape following the form of the tusk; rebated at the foot to receive the inset flat base; decorated with design of lady dressed in robes with flowing scarves, holding a tray with a peach; crane leaning toward woman with beak open; rocky outcrop and tall pine tree in background
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
